#summary Operators are part of the AntiCultureWorld project.

*Operators* use [Entity entities] to destroy or spawn [Entity entities] while altering [NeedStat NeedStats]. An operator is similar to a verb in human language or a predicate in formal language.

==List of Operators==
  * Consume
  * Urinate
  * Defecate
  * Copulate
  * Go
  * Hit
  * Vomit
  * Push
  * Sleep
  * Strike
  * ShareKnowledge
  * Criticize
